title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • 1 point - Family loses as inflation reduces its purchasing power (or real value) or its saving decreases in value / is worth less.

  • 1 point - Business gains as it is paying the creditor using cheaper or inflated dollars.
descriptions:
No points earned.

  • 1 point - Family loses as inflation reduces its purchasing power (or real value) or its saving decreases in value / is worth less.

  • 1 point - Business gains as it is paying the creditor using cheaper or inflated dollars.

Earns 1 of 2 points.

  • 1 point - Family loses as inflation reduces its purchasing power (or real value) or its saving decreases in value / is worth less.

  • 1 point - Business gains as it is paying the creditor using cheaper or inflated dollars.

Earns 2 of 2 points.

  • 1 point - Family loses as inflation reduces its purchasing power (or real value) or its saving decreases in value / is worth less.

  • 1 point - Business gains as it is paying the creditor using cheaper or inflated dollars.

title: Part b.
descriptions:
No point earned.

  • Decrease G or Increase T.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

  • Decrease G or Increase T.

title: Part c.
descriptions:
No point earned.

  • Increase its administered interest rates

Earns 1 of 1 point.

  • Increase its administered interest rates

title: Part d.
descriptions:
No point earned.

  • Nominal interest rate will increase

Earns 1 of 1 point.

  • Nominal interest rate will increase

title: Part e.
stimulusHtml:
1 points

  • 1 point - The international value of the currency will decrease (depreciates) because the demand for the currency decreases OR supply of the currency increases.
descriptions:
No points earned.

  • 1 point - The international value of the currency will decrease (depreciates) because the demand for the currency decreases OR supply of the currency increases.

Earns 1 of 1 points.

  • 1 point - The international value of the currency will decrease (depreciates) because the demand for the currency decreases OR supply of the currency increases.
